translations: （物体射向或抛向空中形成的）轨道，轨迹；（事业等的）发展轨迹，起落；（几何）常角轨道，轨线

sentences.sentence: Most of all it was the extraordinary trajectory of his life.
sentences.translation: 但最重要的是他非凡的人生轨迹。

sentences.sentence: But most of all it was the extraordinary trajectory of his life.
sentences.translation: 但最重要的是，这是他非凡的人生轨迹。

sentences.sentence: Education, and not just knowledge gained on campus, will be a core part of Generation Z's career trajectory.
sentences.translation: 教育（不仅仅是在校园里获得的知识）将会是 Z 世代职业轨迹的核心部分。
